website_summaries.verdict: This rich, sweet ghee is a close clone to what you'll find in India.
pros: Ancient Organic's strong caramel smell will entice you first
Some buyers said this ghee is good enough to eat right out the jar, and close in authenticity to Indian ghee
cons: A few people reported dairy-like reactions, though the ghee should be casein-free

customer_reviews.title: Hybridized cows used to make this product.
customer_reviews.text: Hey folks! This product was top of my list for a while but after more research and a call into the company I found that they use hybridized cows exclusively. A better move that produces much tastier ghee is to buy high quality butter from Europe (they use heritage breed A2 cows in France, Italy and Switzerland). Make sure it is white in color and contains no salt. Making the ghee from this butter was incredible for my digestion and is significantly less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: LactoVeg Lifestyle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Decadent!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using unsalted grass fed butter in my morning coffee and thought I'd try switching things up and I also wanted to cut back on my dairy consumption. I could not imagine that my coffee could taste any better than it does with the butter, but it does! This ghee has a lovely note of caramel and I have to say that it really enhances my morning brew! I've also been known to sneak a little bit of ghee after dinner to satisfy my sweet tooth. It's lightly sweet , creamy, caramel tasting and has a great mouth feel! I'm on my second jar since February, I'm addicted. It's. That. Good.
customer_reviews.author: Lyoness Therapy

customer_reviews.title: The Only Brand I Will Buy
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is delicious. I had never tried ghee before, so I bought it here based upon the reviews, and was immediately impressed. When I ran out, I thought I could just buy any ghee at WalMart, but boy was I disappointed. All ghee is not made the same and this is SUPERIOR in both texture and flavor and smells amazing. I've reordered several times and will continue to do so. It is worth the expense, and the heavy jar and Ancient Organics packaging are proof of their attention to detail and how much care they put into their product.
customer_reviews.author: LadyJ

customer_reviews.title: So dang good!
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is wonderful! It taste like a Werther’s candy to me. The texture is heavenly as well. I use it in my coffee and have even used it on my toast. It’s expensive but worth it IMO. Great fats and good vitamins including vitamin K2 which is a soft tissue decalcifiyer. Great for decalcifiying the ol third eye (pineal gland). I’ve ordered it several times and just know moved up to the 16oz because the 8oz is short lived in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee out there!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my local Sprouts market does not sell this, so I have to purchase this on Amazon. I have tried just about every Ghee out there, including the one from Trader Joe's. This one is my absolute favorite and I almost feel like eating it straight by the spoonful!! It's so A-mazingly delicious! I just wish it came with PRIME delivery at this price, as this is also the most expensive Ghee I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Liset

customer_reviews.title: Divine flavor
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in the fridge (yes I know you don't have to) because I use it so sparingly, and it lasts for many many moths that way. If it wasn't so expensive, I'd use it on everything I eat. The flavor is amazing. I have had other ghee, and the fact that this is organic, and made from Grass fed cows- the way this company makes it- makes it so much better than anything I've had before. I only eat it fresh (like on popcorn or roasted vegetables) before serving, as it is expensive and I can get more bang for the buck- by using it just before eating.
customer_reviews.author: In the HillsTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin? I did not like my first taste at all, lol. But, I decided to give it a fair tryout. Used it in baking, for pan cooking, and even on toast. It grew on me and now, I find myself reaching for this instead of other fats for a number of things, it melts beautifully on toast and has a distinctive sweet taste to me. This is second purchase for me, but will not be the last. So flavorful and adds great taste to lentils, beans, you name it.
customer_reviews.author: OhioGal

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the hype, I ordered. The consistency is that of melted butter so be careful when you open it. I lost a lot upon opening not knowing any better. A little goes a long way so don't overdo it! I was very happy to see I could cook at a high temp without it burning and turning my food black like butter. The taste is great. I see I don't need to refrigerate it, unless I plan to keep it forever. it came well packaged in a neat little box inside of the amazon box. I'm a new fan and will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best and only ghee I will buy from now on!
customer_reviews.text: Had tried a few ghee products over the years and was disappointed and ended up throwing them away. I couldn't understand what the fuss was about and why it was so expensive. I have been using this for 2 weeks now and it is smooth, melts to pure liquid without foaming (like stick butter). My friend said "isn't it just butter?" well yes and no. This has a nutty but fresh and nice smell. I really am pleasantly surprised and will be buying again!!!
customer_reviews.author: deezergirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee there is
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying the some of the numerous Ghee's that are available on Amazon and Ancient Organics Ghee is by far and away the best flavor, consistently good quality of all the others that I have tried. Most other Ghee's are very strong in flavor almost like the phony butter oil that you use on popcorn. Ancient Organics is not the cheapest, but it is the best. Ghee can be used in anything that requires butter. It does not contain salt. I use it on garlic bread, sautéing vegetables, frying eggs, etc. Since it is clarified butter, you find that you do not need as much when you use it. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michael Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Smells like caramel and tastes divine!
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying the Trader Joe's ghee, and my daughter encouraged me to go online and get some grass fed ghee instead. She said I'd really be able to tell the difference. I thought that was unlikely, but I went for it anyway. Let me tell you something – I can really tell the difference! This stuff smells like caramel. Seriously. And when I melt it and put it on popcorn (mixed with a bit of olive oil), it's beyond wonderful. I don't use regular butter at all anymore, and my next order of this will be a bigger container, because this is going fast! Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: yesicansd

customer_reviews.title: Edible.quality=yes. Quantity=questionable
customer_reviews.text: Was not prepared with quality camera to post the large air gap thru middle of jar. Also, no scale, but i believe i did not receive half of what I paid for. It coated a few pieces of toast=tasty & a batch of popcorn=fantastic. If i didn't pay for air, than why such a big jar? That is a big waste of material
customer_reviews.author: Rrr

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best organic Ghee available
customer_reviews.text: While one of the most expensive Organic Ghee options out there; it is simply the best available on every level. Taste, texture, consistency and quality. So far I’ve not found a better or I should say less expensive option that compares. This is family favorite by far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Ghee
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting Ghee I have tried. I have used this product for two years and ordered it as gifts for friends. I used it for cooking, sometimes with olive oil and in my morning espresso or chai. Customer service is excellent - I once received a jar that I was unable to open when I sent a query via Amazon I received a speedy reply and a promise of a replacement which arrived about a week later. Needless to say I am a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ghee. Good for fried/scrambled eggs.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried 4 brands of ghee from Asian grocery and Amazon. This is the best for flavor. I use it to fry eggs and coat pan for baked fish. The small jar is sufficient for this 1-person household, lasting almost 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: CLF

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Had been using Ancient Organic, but tried another brand and was really disappointed with the flavor. So went back to Ancient Organic. Like to use it on vegetables. Makes even brussel sprouts taste good. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Billie Hale

customer_reviews.title: delicious great product
customer_reviews.text: i thought i was getting a bigger bottle than I did . was quite a small bottle for almost 12$. great product and healthy but a bit too expensive for the size. can get a bigger bottle from other companies that make ghee and are also organic.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Best add for Keto dieters
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what other KETO dieters use, but this is BY FAR the most delicious good fat out there... I use it when making eggs, or anything that would normally call for butter. Haven't tried it in bulletproof coffee, as I see it's smell and flavor are more beneficial in my actual food. I ordered the larger jar previously and unfortunately a lot of it went to waste, as the shelf life is best if used within 30 days. Buy more smaller jars if you don't use a large amount daily.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Taste
customer_reviews.text: High quality and amazing taste. This is my favorite ghee, and I’ve tried a lot of different brands. Their customer service is top notch as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: The best organic ghee out there!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for the best ghee out there, this is it! I have tried and bought many ghees from India but this one from California is not a permanent staple in my pantry. It melts perfectly and has the perfect yellow color. The flavor from the ghee does not overpower your food. I use this ghee when I am cooking scrambled eggs on the weekends (instead of oil). I really can taste the difference. I also like the fact that this ghee is organic and made in the United States. Ancient Organics even guarantees that the milk came from Happy cows! How you could you not support that? :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Keene-Gross

customer_reviews.title: Butter Crack!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Where has GHEE been all of my life? This stuff is AMAZING! I've tried it on chicken and vegetables so far. It totally kicks butter up several notches and puts it into "butter on steroids" mode. I will order the larger jar next time. This is now a staple in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: This is a really small jar
customer_reviews.text: You do not get a lot of ghee for almost $12.00. Unless this flavor is extraordinary, there are organic ghees out there for much less money and greater quantity. I will never trust an "Amazon Choice" again.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor. 100% organic.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the flavor of this ghee. I also liked that it was 100% organic. Under USDA rules you can have a percentage of non-organic mixed with organic and still label it organic.
customer_reviews.author: Avsbluesky

customer_reviews.title: North California grass fed cows
customer_reviews.text: MADE IN AMERICA, grass fed and pastured cows. The flavor is outstanding, true gee/butter flavor. Excellent for cooking. My family used to make gee, and its it so much easier to buy this than fuss around in the kitchen. a little bit goes a long way. the price swings alot, I had to go to another brand, blue jar, to keep buying gee. I will buy this if the price is down. one jar lasted me a long month, eggs, meat, popcorn. I also use it to rub down cake pans and my bundt pan.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage PowerReader

customer_reviews.title: Odd flavor
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really like this. It didn't have the nutty ghee taste I'm used to. Hard to explain it. Just know I won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Helen F Vajgert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptional ghee. I'm not a professional chef, but I do appreciate how much quality ingredients can affect the outcome of your dish. This is one of those products that makes me seem more talented than I really am. It smells and tastes great, and that flavor absolutely comes through even in more complex dishes. I replaced the butter in my favorite brownie recipe with this ghee and it was remarkable. Great product, great service, and a handwritten thank you note in the package. Try this ghee.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Maiello

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ghee
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great!! Wonderful flavor! I use it in my coffee and can't get over how delicious it is. I also use it on toast on occasion. I will definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Martini

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mmmm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ghee when gold nugget was sold out. It’s absolutely delicious very happy with it. Ghee is extremely healthy. Beware of Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids! Ghee, butter and coconut oil are more ideal. Vegetable oils are toxic
customer_reviews.author: Reverie

customer_reviews.title: Taste wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The taste is wonderful this is one of the many products I buy because of the Keto diet and I love it check out more review on my YouTube channel “OwenG lab rat “ ✌️
customer_reviews.author: Og

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee I've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, this ghee is most certainly worth every penny you will spend. It has the most divine flavor......nutty and sweet and it's very fresh. It tastes so good you can eat it out of the jar! Honestly, I would recommend trying this product. It's made in small batches from cows that are grass-fed and you can really taste the quality and care put into the product. I ordered a small jar to start, and I'll be ordering the larger size jar the next time I order. You will not be disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pennygirl

customer_reviews.title: The best Ghee out there....
customer_reviews.text: No other brand even comes close...I only order Ancient Organics...might be a little expensive but so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: JadedBrat

customer_reviews.title: Ghee GLEE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you love a rich butter flavor, this is THE Ghee for you. Made from [...] butter, the best dairy on earth, This concentrates the flavor so a little equals huge butter flavor. No refrigeration needed, perfect for frying, grilling, baking, freezing, any time you would use butter but would love to really enjoy the buttery taste, Please try Ancient Organic Ghee! Eggs, Popcorn, Shortbread, Lobster, Tortillas, Baked Potato, Veggies.....What do you like with butter?
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Omg, this is the best ghee I have ever tried! It’s expensive but worth it every gram of it!
customer_reviews.author: Minky

customer_reviews.title: The best Ghee ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this Ghee because it has a unique nutty flavor unlike any other Ghees that I have tried. The other brands have really turned me off so it was a fabulous surprise to find this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a healthier fat... ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a healthier fat...not crazy about the taste but I use it for pan frying some things that will be flavored afterward,
customer_reviews.author: czar42

customer_reviews.title: rubbish products
customer_reviews.text: i just received it .as soon as i opened smelled like sheep fat being left over for a long time i throw it away. i will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID A.

customer_reviews.title: rganic Original Grass-fed Ghee
customer_reviews.text: product fine but we didn't like taste - but that's just a personal thing nothing against product
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Soooooooooooo good, smells like caramel
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ghee I've ever had. I cook with it, I stir it in my coffee and cocoa, I use this stuff all the time. It's the best ghee in town
customer_reviews.author: Emily B

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I almost hesitate to say how good this ghee is for fear of shortages. Bon Appetit just rated it as one of the 25 best products to have in your kitchen (Dec 2013, I believe). My daughters and I actually open the jar sometimes just to smell it. It has a rich, almost caramel essence. We have tried several brands of ghee and this brand is by far the best out there. IIt can be used for all cooking purposes, but as of late, I have become more selective as it does cost more than other cooking options.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: It is organic and a healthy fat full of flavor! I will definitely use again!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily and love it♥️! I use it in coffee, vegetables and on meat.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: which is good stuff, but it was just like the fun ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most delicious material on the planet. I could just eat scoops of this out of the jar. The first thing I cooked with it was just a simple light sauté with some baby spinach. I ate it up with my fingers waiting for the other parts of dinner to cook. For comparison, I then sautéed some spinach with some Kerrygold unsalted grass-fed butter, which is good stuff, but it was just like the fun left the party compared to this Ancient Organics grass-fed ghee. It is amazing. No need to look further. Click BUY right now!
customer_reviews.author: EveAnna D Manley

customer_reviews.title: delisious
customer_reviews.text: absolutely amazing taste. but... very expensive if you use it on regular routine cooking . this 8 oz. jar can go in a few cookings for a family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: The best thing I've bought this year
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is amazing. I have been trying to cook and eat more with pastured dairy and came across this while reading reviews for a different brand of ghee. I bought this based on others' reviews and I'm so glad I did. It tastes nutty, and is a perfect addition to pretty much anything I've used in. I love that it is organic, from happy, pastured cows and the company seems like a good business. I have already bought another jar!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am Indian, grew up eating Ghee and take my word for this: This is the best Ghee i've ever tasted. No milk solids, no weird smell. This is the real stuff.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewnator

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ghee I've found. Great aroma. Expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: O.M.GHEE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the 8th wonder of the world! I heard about replacing my cooking oils with Ghee, so I finally decided to try it. YUM!!! Now I use it on EVERYTHING! It makes sautéing anything taste fantastic, and I use it instead of plain butter to flavor mashed potatoes, eggs, and anything else I can think of... the flavor is unbeatable and I'll never go back!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: More flavor = use less
customer_reviews.text: ie: 1Tbsp stick butter = 1/2 tsp ANCIENT ORGANICS 100% Organic Ghee when all your really wanting is that glorious buttery taste on your steamed veggies. And you don't have to use salt to punch up the taste either.
customer_reviews.author: sueV

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GOOD STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could buy this locally, but the Indian market/Sprouts/Whole Foods doesn't carry it. This is amazing stuff! It's the best ghee I've ever had and I've tried most brands.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Bye margarine!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold on this. Getting the larger jar next. Taste is great and you don't have to use a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I received this product. It was only 8 oz. and I thought I had re-ordered from previously purchasing the 32 oz. jar. The product, however, is awesome. Just pay very close attention to the size you are ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Ethyl Mertz

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Best Ghee I've ever had. I used to use at different times in my life but never really loved it. I will certainly buy this over and over again because it tastes great and it has health benefits. This one however, tastes almost identical to the "regular" butter we are used to. Also, I LOVE that it's from Grass-fed cows! WAy to go Ancient Organics!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good brand!
customer_reviews.text: I compared it to another brand and this one was much better. It has a caramel like scent and flavor, it reminds me of Golden Syrup. It is sooo good on waffles and popcorn! Professional packaging and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: a wood

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and packaged very well. The quality is superb, my grandma would be envious !
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for butter or oil
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I've been using this ghee instead of butter and oil for about a month now and it's been wonderful. I think it adds a bit more depth to the flavor profile of the food and it creates a wonderful medium to do pretty much anything! Love it. I definitely will purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Griffin

customer_reviews.title: taste awsome
customer_reviews.text: the taste is so good. the only draw back is the price
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Love this butter!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this butter!! It was a small container and I drive bulletproof coffee about 4-5 days a week. Arrived quickly and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: princessrayne

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE ghee! It tastes like caramel and helps it's better for you than butter. I use it as a substitute in all my baking and cooking now and notice no difference (or enhances the flavor)
customer_reviews.author: Ksalz9348

customer_reviews.title: This stuff smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: So, I had no idea what to expect bc I've never used this stuff before, but when I opened it it smells so great! I was tempted to grab a spoon! The smell reminds me of toffee, and when I tasted a teensy sliver of it by itself it had a very pleasant flavor. It is not super flavorful, I don't think it's supposed to be, but the bit that my tastebuds picked up was very nice. I'm really looking forward to cooking with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought the 8oz size to test it! I am ordering the 32 oz jar right away!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and very healthy! I am adding it to my morning coffee, with and added teaspoon of Coconut butter. Did I mention delicious 😋?
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed....
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say this stuff is AWESOME!! I was kinda skeptical at trying it at first, but once I tasted it I was hooked! I heard about it through the Paleo Diet and wanted to try it as an alternative to cooking with butter. It's got a really good flavor and consistency. Also, they send you you a pretty cool little informational brochure that tells you everything you need to know about it. Overall, very impressed with the product and how much pride the company takes in it.
customer_reviews.author: TeeJay

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ghee! I’ve been enjoying working it into recipes and everyday cooking. Not the cheapest but worth the extra.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Ghee Review
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this brand of Ghee butter. It is so smooth and healthy and tasty. The lunar method of how Ancient Organics produces this product is very interesting and I believe it adds to the positive healthy energy this butter gives me. Having high cholestrol myself, I feel good about using this healthy butter.It is fantastic on popcorn!
customer_reviews.author: B Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Love this ghee
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but certainly the ghee to get. I've incorporated this more into my cooking and prefer this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff - the moment I opened the glass jar ...
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff - the moment I opened the glass jar the smell of it reminded me of the days long gone - my sister's and mine summer vacations with Grandma. It performs very well on any surface frying pan (I use white ceramic, stainless and cast iron). Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: A. V. A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this instead of butter. I will keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: mth

customer_reviews.title: wonderful goodness
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase of grass fed cows ghee. I usually buy a nice quality ghee from Whole Foods, but this one from Ancient organics is a noticeable difference. Pricey, so will not be buying as often, but for the quality this purchase was worth the price. Yummy and good for you too.
customer_reviews.author: VJB

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful. It is if good quality. Will buy again . Thank
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flavor and texture
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different types of ghee and some of them have a weird waxy flavor and texture, but this one is perfection. It is creamy, buttery goodness and quite versatile. I use it for cooking, baking and as a spread. It is definitely worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: A very tasty clarified butter. Considering the cost, I might make my own next time, but I am very satisfied with this product. I am currently on the Specific Carbohydrate Diet and not using regular butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Taste amazing in my coffee and great for gut health!
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff !
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and it didn’t burn anything! For cooking & making body butter for personal use!
customer_reviews.author: DKNY

customer_reviews.title: Don't get any other brand..
customer_reviews.text: My family and I inhaled this stuff lol. It made us all feel so good! And it helped clear up my skin.... Just buy it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: absolutely fantastic. made local to me from butter from a ...
customer_reviews.text: absolutely fantastic. made local to me from butter from a well-known farm. the taste is unbelievable. I use it in almost every place you'd use butter or oil. My kids now won't eat any popcorn that isn't "daddy's popcorn," meaning whirlypop popped white corn topped with this ghee. It's the ghee that puts it over the top. I recently switched over to a ketogenic diet, so now I devour this stuff at a prodigious rate.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Justman

customer_reviews.title: Healthy fat
customer_reviews.text: This is good for making buttery stovetop popcorn without turning brown, smoke or burn like regular butter does. I can reuse it again for cooking other foods. It is considered a healthy fat. I also melt in a dipping dish for my pizza crusts. Delish!
customer_reviews.author: Minerva Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING TASTE!
customer_reviews.text: DELICIOUS!!!! Reminds me of eating a delicious piece of REAL buttery toast with my Grandma as a little girl!!! This organic ghee is AMAZING! I added it to my coffee every day and drank it while teaching! Just ordered another jar!! If you love real butter, you will LOVE this organic grass fed ghee! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste!
customer_reviews.text: Taste was really good on this ghee - will buy again and LOVE that it is grass fed
customer_reviews.author: Joan L.

customer_reviews.title: Whoa nellie!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, wasn't expecting this Ghee to be so great! The smell, my god, it's like buttery caramel! sheez louise, I'm in love! The company's "energy" is all over the elegant and precise packing and nice note. The Shizz.
customer_reviews.author: golden hawk

customer_reviews.title: Glad they listened and are offering larger sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I just reordered in the 32oz size. Though it is getting easier to find Ghee or clarified butter locally, I still cannot find organic grass fed ghee locally. I prefer this brand to the Pure Indian Organic Grass fed ghee I was purchasing prior. I find the consistency better in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Yummmmy
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing this brand of ghee but it is delicious. I love ghee. It is the perfect medium for sautéing. I love the mild buttery taste it gives food. A lot of paleo people use coconut oil but I am a die hard ghee fan. This brand does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Land

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Will buy larger bottle next time.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a small bottle to see if I liked it. A little pricey but good quality so worth it. Melts so easy in my coffee. Taste is good too
customer_reviews.author: Martin W Meyer

customer_reviews.title: And was surprised that it tasted so good.
customer_reviews.text: Received in timely manner. And was surprised that it tasted so good.
customer_reviews.author: Soamer Jamil

customer_reviews.title: BEST GHEE EVER - BUY THIS BRAND
customer_reviews.text: I originally tried Purity Ghee - and I was so disappointed by it. But, Ancient Organics? Oh my goodness, what a difference. You can smell and taste the quality. You will not go wrong buying this high quality ghee (made from reputable Straus dairy). I have my whole family hooked. Ways to enjoy... On Paleo Bread and baked goods Baked in baked goods Scrambling pastured eggs Browning grass fed meats Sautéing vegetables The list goes on... it's wonderful! AND... beauty! I slather it on my face and skin for anti aging and moisturizing properties. Also good for massage.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I don't use butter and can't remember the last time I had butter in the fridge (I cook with olive oil). A little sliver of this Ghee into my chicken broth multi-grain vegi soup gives a rich buttery taste that is amazing. How did 1/4 teaspoon add so much flavor! You have to treat yourself to this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Delectable Ghee
customer_reviews.text: This makes the best cookies and adds a special extra goodness to food. I will keep purchasing this as I found it to be a high quality product. I think I'll purchase the largest size in the future.
customer_reviews.author: 2Bornot2B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best ghee you can get. Ordering right now more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Ghee
customer_reviews.text: Yummy this mess is ghee I mean good! It has a caramel type taste to it to me. I like it. Ive used it for toast, baking popcorn all kinds of stuff. If you are looking for a butter taste this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Havik

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Ghee
customer_reviews.text: We love this Ghee. The smell and flavor are both excellent and the customer service and packaging was impeccable. The only thing we wish is that there was more of it, but we understand that a small business has to make a profit to keep producing a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but small amount
customer_reviews.text: Ioved the product and a amazing taste BUT very small amount for the money
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: tasty
customer_reviews.text: this is my new butter. I love the nutty flavor and it's great to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I drink bulletproof coffee and this is hands down one of my favorite brands of Ghee. The bulletproof brand is great too and I think may be of a slightly better quality (more strictly grass fed cows) but slightly nutty taste of this ghee is unparalleled.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Adamski

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE GHEE
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVORITE GHEE. Some might say it's a bit spend, but I've seen ghee for much more and the same amount in oz. I adore this ghee. It has a nutty smell, and it makes food taste great. I will continue to buy this ghee!!
customer_reviews.author: RMOben

customer_reviews.title: This tastes great and is a welcome addition to our recipes since ...
customer_reviews.text: This tastes great and is a welcome addition to our recipes since we've started the paleo diet. I think it's worth the price and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach S

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. This may sound strange but it tastes like caramel without the sugar. I keep it in the fridge and use it like butter on my toast in the morning. I have used it a little for cooking too and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseallek

customer_reviews.title: Check the ounces
customer_reviews.text: This product is much smaller than I expected. Not a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Carnevale

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product. It has a high heat point, ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. It has a high heat point, so I can cook with it. Plus I have a cow dairy milk allergy, but this product does not affect me adversely. Eat up!
customer_reviews.author: J. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Great-tasting, but experienced a dairy reaction
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best-tasting brands of ghee I've ever tried, but unfortunately, I had a dairy reaction to it. I know some are filtered more than others, and this one unfortunately did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Ghee-licious
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this golden nectar. It's delicious and good for you. I use it on everything. I feel that the price on Amazon is comparable to the local stores and I don't have to drive to go get it.
customer_reviews.author: SennyD

customer_reviews.title: Go Get Ghee
customer_reviews.text: Tastes very good. Much nicer to sauté in ghee than plain butter as no burning or smoking. I use ghee, olive oil, and coconut oil for cooking. Ghee can be tolerated by my daughter who is lactose intolerant.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Carr

customer_reviews.title: A most delicious ghee
customer_reviews.text: This is an very good ghee though I must say it's awfully expensive as well. At the price it is, I'm afraid it's going to be a rare treat and I'll have to purchase other ghees for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Cooking Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This is tasty and fresh. I have lactose intolerance and was told I could eat this without a problem. I tried only a small amount (~1 tablespoon) but had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: human

product_meta.title: Organic Original Grass-fed Ghee, Butter by ANCIENT ORGANICS, 8 oz., Pasture Raised, Non GMO, Lactose - Casein - Gluten FREE, Certified KOSHER - 100% Organic Certified - USDA Approved (In Gift Box)
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1Ancient Organics Ghee is a premium cooking oil celebrated for its taste, nutritional benefits, and medicinal qualities—it is unlike any other ghee on the market today. Our Ghee is hand-crafted over an open flame and made in small batches, ensuring you will always get the freshest Ghee. With an uncompromising commitment to quality and an obsessive attention to detail, we guarantee you won't find a more pure, better tasting Ghee. Ghee is the complete distillation of butter— the end result of a long, slow, careful clarification process that removes all the moisture, lactose and casein, making it completely shelf stable AND a perfect choice for people who are lactose intolerant. The difference between Ghee and clarified butter lies in their flavor and shelf stability: Ghee is superior on both counts Ayurveda recognizes ghee as an essential part of a balanced diet and is considered to be the very best oil one can eat. It has been used for centuries as a digestive and elimination aid, for energy, sexual vitality, skin and eye health, as a lubricant for the joints and for alkalizing the blood. Comprised of full spectrum short-, medium-, and long-chain fatty acids, Ghee contains Omega 3 and Omega 9 essential fatty acids along with vitamins A, D, E and K. Our Ghee is one of the highest natural sources of CLA (Conjugated Linoleic Acid) because we use only the highest quality organic butter of pastured cows. Our golden Ghee has a delicious caramelized and nutty taste that will enhance the flavor of any culinary creation. It has one of the highest flash points (485ºF) and it is simply the best choice for high temperature cooking. Substitute our Ghee for olive oil, butter or vegetable oil in or on anything from soups, potatoes, rice and vegetables, with eggs, pancakes, oatmeal, smoothies or popcorn—the possibilities are truly endless. Try it—you will love it!
feature_bullets: SUPREME COOKING OIL WITH HIGH SMOKEPOINT AT 485 DEGREES
CONTAINS TRACES OF OMEGA 3, 6, 9, VITAMINS A, D, E & K
MADE WITH BUTTER FROM GRASS-FED AND PASTURED COWS
